tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
quoteText:
<u>The Riot Services are provided to you on an “as is” and “as available” basis without warranties or representations of any kind, express or implied.
You assume all responsibility for your use of the Riot Services.
To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, Riot Games disclaims all warranties, express or implied, which might apply to the Riot Services, including implied warranties of title, non-infringement, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, any warranties that may arise from course of dealing, course of performance or usage of trade, and any warranties as to the accuracy, reliability or quality of any content or info contained within the Riot Services.
